page_content:
See	our	Sustainability Report 2019 Annex	for	key	quantitative	data	
compiled	in	accordance	with	the	GRI	and	SASB	frameworks	and	
standards,	along	with	additional	details	on	our	workforce,	revenues,	
sales,	stakeholders,	locations,	and	EHS	certifications.
